page_description: A web-based rain notifier for RBLXRoll
socket_connecting_description: We're connecting you to our socket for live notifications
socket_connected_description: You're connected to our socket, you'll be notified based on your preferences below
socket_reconnecting_description: Connection was lost, hold on tight!
rain_site_notification_body: A rain of {{amount}} R$ is running
rain_user_notification_body: A rain of {{amount}} R$ created by {{username}} is running
settings_sound_description: Play a sound whenever a rain is running
settings_notification_description: Show a notification whenever a rain is running
